name: Kinnaur
description: Kinnaur is a district in Himachal Pradesh known for its stunning landscapes, apple orchards, and unique culture. The district is famous for its Kinnauri temples, traditional architecture, and the Hindustan-Tibet Road.
summary: A paradise for nature lovers and cultural enthusiasts

locations.name: Kalpa
locations.description: Scenic town known for its apple orchards and views of the Kinner Kailash range.

locations.name: Sangla Valley
locations.description: Beautiful valley known for its apple orchards, traditional architecture, and trekking trails.

locations.name: Reckong Peo
locations.description: District headquarters known for its scenic views and cultural heritage.
locations.address: Reckong Peo, Kinnaur District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Nako Lake
locations.description: High-altitude lake surrounded by ancient monasteries and scenic beauty.

locations.name: Chitkul
locations.description: Last inhabited village near the Indo-Tibet border, known for its scenic beauty.
